allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement credit system for trip generation

- Add credit tables schema \(user_credits, credit_transactions, credit_packages\)
- Add credits API endpoint for balance/transactions/packages
- Add Latpeed webhook for payment processing
- Add credit deduction logic to generate-itinerary API
- Add frontend credits module with balance display
- Update auth-ui to show credit balance in header
- Add @supabase/supabase-js dependency for server-side operations

Features:
- 3 free credits on signup \(bonus\)
- Credit packages: Starter \(10\), Pro \(30\), Premium \(100\)
- 1 credit per trip generation
- Real-time balance updates after generation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
